title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2209.7 - Delegation of authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2209.7 - Delegation of authority

State Regulations

The administrator may delegate in writing, to the
district rent administrator or any other person or persons, the authority to
carry out any of the duties and powers granted to him by the Rent Law or these
regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2209.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
